articles.title: Google Stadia is a lonely place - The Verge
articles.description: Google’s Stadia cloud streaming service has potential, but there aren’t enough players yet. Some top online games feel empty as a result, and Google has plenty of work to do to convince people to spend money and time on Stadia.
articles.content: I really like the idea of Stadia. Googles cloud gaming service was unveiled just a year ago with the promise that the future of gaming isnt a box under your TV but a place instead. Stadiums have hosted sports for centuries, and Google sold Stadia as a new ven… [+7191 chars]
